   20: 
   21: -module(match_spec_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0]).
   24: -export([init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   25:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   26:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: -export([test_1/1, test_2/1, test_3/1, test_4a/1, test_4b/1, test_5a/1,
   28:          test_5b/1, test_6/1, caller_and_return_to/1, bad_match_spec_bin/1,
   29: 	 trace_control_word/1, silent/1, silent_no_ms/1, silent_test/1,
   30: 	 ms_trace2/1, ms_trace3/1, ms_trace_dead/1, boxed_and_small/1,
   31: 	 destructive_in_test_bif/1, guard_exceptions/1,
   32: 	 empty_list/1,
   33: 	 unary_plus/1, unary_minus/1, moving_labels/1,
   34:          guard_bifs/1]).
   35: -export([fpe/1]).
   36: -export([otp_9422/1]).
   37: -export([faulty_seq_trace/1, do_faulty_seq_trace/0]).
   38: -export([maps/1]).
   39: -export([runner/2, loop_runner/3, fixed_runner/2]).
   40: -export([f1/1, f2/2, f3/2, fn/1, fn/2, fn/3]).
   41: -export([do_boxed_and_small/0]).
   42: -export([f1_test4/1, f2_test4/2, f3_test4/2]).
   43: 
   44: % This test suite assumes that tracing in general works. What we test is
   45: % the match spec functionality.
   46: 
   47: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   48: 
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   52: 
   53: all() ->
   54:     trace_sessions:all() ++
   55:     testcases_ets() ++
   56:     testcases_match_spec_test().
   57: 
   58: groups() ->
   59:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases_trace()).
   60: 
   61: testcases_trace() ->
   62:     [test_1, test_2, test_3, test_4a, test_4b, test_5a, test_5b, test_6,
   63:      caller_and_return_to,
   64:      trace_control_word,
   65:      silent, silent_no_ms, silent_test,
   66:      ms_trace2, ms_trace3, ms_trace_dead,
   67:      otp_9422].
   68: 
   69: testcases_ets() ->
   70:     [bad_match_spec_bin, fpe].
   71: 
   72: testcases_match_spec_test() ->
   73:     [boxed_and_small, destructive_in_test_bif,
   74:      guard_exceptions, unary_plus, unary_minus,
   75:      moving_labels, faulty_seq_trace, empty_list,
   76:      maps, guard_bifs].
   77: 
   78: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   79:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   80: 
   81: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   83: 
   84: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   85:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   86: 
   87: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   88:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   89: 
   90: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   91:     Config.
   92: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   93:     (erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config)
   94:      andalso
   95:      trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config)).
   96: 
   97: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
   98:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
   99: 
  100: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B) ->
  101:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B).
  102: 
  103: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
  104:     %%erlang:display({?LINE, "B", B}),
  105:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
  106: 
  107: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
  108:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
  109: 
  110: 
  111: test_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
  113:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  114:        [],
  115:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [a]}}]),
  116: 
  117:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  118:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  119:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[]}],
  120:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}}]),
  121: 
  122:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  123:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  124:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, false}]}],
  125:        []),
  126: 
  127:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  128:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  129:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
  130:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}, 4711}]),
  131: 
  132:     Ref = make_ref(),
  133:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(Ref, Ref) end,
  134:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  135:        [{[Ref,'$1'],[{is_reference, '$1'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
  136:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [Ref, Ref]}, 4711}]),
  137:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(Ref, Ref) end,
  138:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  139:        [{['$1',Ref],[{is_reference, '$1'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
  140:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [Ref, Ref]}, 4711}]),
  141: 
  142:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  143:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  144:        [{['$0','$0'],[{is_atom, '$0'}],[{message, 4711}]}],
  145:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}, 4711}]),
  146: 
  147:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, b) end,
  148:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  149:        [{['_','_'],[],[]}],
  150:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, b]}}]),
  151: 
  152:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, b) end,
  153:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  154:        [{['_','_'],[],[{message, '$_'}]}],
  155:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, b]}, [a, b]}]),
  156: 
  157:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, '$_') end,
  158:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  159:        [{['$1','$_'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[]}],
  160:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, '$_']}}]),
  161: 
  162:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1({a}) end,
  163:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  164:        [{['$1'],[{'==', '$1', {const, {a}}}],[]}],
  165:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [{a}]}}]),
  166: 
  167:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1({a}) end,
  168:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  169:        [{['$1'],[{'==', '$1', {{a}}}],[]}],
  170:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [{a}]}}]),
  171: 
  172:     %% Undocumented, currently.
  173:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  174:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  175:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, 4711},
  176:                                         {message, true}]}],
  177:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}}]),
  178: 
  179:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  180:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  181:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{message, 4711},
  182:                                         {message, false}]}],
  183:        []),
  184: 
  185:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  186:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  187:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[kakalorum]}],
  188:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}}]),
  189: 
  190:     %% Verify that 'process_dump' can handle a matchstate on the stack.
  191:     tr(fun() -> fbinmatch(<<0>>, 0) end,
  192:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  193:        [{['_'],[],[{message, {process_dump}}]}],
  194:        [fun({trace, _, call, {?MODULE, f1, [0]}, _Bin}) -> true end]),
  195: 
  196:     % Error cases
  197:     errchk([{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{banka, kanin}]}]),
  198:     ok.
  199: 
  200: test_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  201:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f2(a, a) end,
  202:        {?MODULE, f2, 2},
  203:        [{['$1','$1'],[{is_atom, '$1'}],[{return_trace}]}],
  204:        [{call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}},
  205:         {return_from, {?MODULE, f2, 2}, {a, a}}]),
  206:     ok.
  207: 
  208: %% Test the enable_trace/2 and caller/0 PAM instructions
  209: test_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     Fun1 = fun() -> 
  211: 		   register(fnoppelklopfer,self()),
  212: 		   ?MODULE:f2(a, b),
  213: 		   ?MODULE:f2(a, b) 
  214: 	   end,
  215:     P1 = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun1]),
  216:     Pat = [{['$1','$1'],[],[{message,
  217:                              [{enable_trace, P1, call},{caller}]}]},
  218:            {['_','_'],[],[{message,
  219:                            [{disable_trace, fnoppelklopfer, call}]}]}],
  220:     Fun2 = fun() -> ?MODULE:f3(a, a) end,
  221:     P2 = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun2]),
  222:     erlang_trace(P2, true, [call]),
  223:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2, 2}, Pat),
  224:     collect(P2, [{trace, P2, call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, a]}, [true,
  225: 							     {?MODULE,f3,2}]}]),
  226:     collect(P1, [{trace, P1, call, {?MODULE, f2, [a, b]}, [true]}]),
  227:     ok.
  228: 
  229: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `call` and `global`
  230: test_4a(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  231:     Fun = fun() -> ?MODULE:f3_test4(a, b) end,
  232:     Pat = [{'_', [],[{message, {caller_line}}]}],
  233:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  234:     erlang_trace(P, true, [call]),
  235:     %% `global` is implied but we still mention explicitly
  236:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test4, 2}, Pat, [global]),
  237:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test4, 1}, Pat, [global]),
  238:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test4, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}},
  239:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test4, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}}]),
  240:     ok.
  241: 
  242: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `return_trace`, `call` and `global`
  243: test_4b(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  244:     Fun = fun() -> ?MODULE:f3_test4(a, b) end,
  245:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  246:     Pat = [{'_', [], [{return_trace}, {message, {caller_line}}]}],
  247:     erlang_trace(P, true, [call]),
  248:     %% `global` is implied but we still mention explicitly
  249:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test4, 2}, Pat, [global]),
  250:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test4, 1}, Pat, [global]),
  251:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test4, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}},
  252:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test4, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test4, 2, {"test4.erl", 3}}},
  253:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f1_test4, 1}, {a}},
  254:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f2_test4, 2}, {a}}
  255:                ]),
  256:     ok.
  257: 
  258: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `call` and `local`
  259: test_5a(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  260:     Fun = fun() -> f3_test5(a, b) end,
  261:     Pat = [{'_', [],[{message, {caller_line}}]}],
  262:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  263:     erlang_trace(P, true, [call]),
  264:     %% Notice `local` function tracing
  265:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test5, 2}, Pat, [local]),
  266:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test5, 1}, Pat, [local]),
  267:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test5, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}},
  268:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test5, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}}]),
  269:     ok.
  270: 
  271: %% Test `caller_line` trace with `return_trace`, `call` and `local`
  272: test_5b(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  273:     Fun = fun() -> f3_test5(a, b) end,
  274:     P = spawn(?MODULE, runner, [self(), Fun]),
  275:     Pat = [{'_', [], [{return_trace}, {message, {caller_line}}]}],
  276:     erlang_trace(P, true, [call]),
  277:     %% Notice `local` function tracing
  278:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test5, 2}, Pat, [local]),
  279:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test5, 1}, Pat, [local]),
  280:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test5, [a, b]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}},
  281:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test5, [a]}, {?MODULE, f3_test5, 2, {"test5.erl", 3}}},
  282:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f1_test5, 1}, {a}},
  283:                 {trace, P, return_from, {?MODULE, f2_test5, 2}, {a}}
  284:                ]),
  285:     ok.
  286: 
  287: %% Test current_stacktrace/[0,1]
  288: test_6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  289:     %% Test non small argument
  290:     case catch erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test6, '_'},
  291:                                     [{'_', [], [{message, {current_stacktrace, a}}]}]) of
  292:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} -> ok;
  293:         Other1 -> ct:fail({noerror, Other1})
  294:     end,
  295: 
  296:     %% Test negative
  297:     case catch erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test6, '_'},
  298:                                     [{'_', [], [{message, {current_stacktrace, -1}}]}]) of
  299:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} -> ok;
  300:         Other2 -> ct:fail({noerror, Other2})
  301:     end,
  302: 
  303:     Fun = fun() -> f5_test6() end,
  304:     Pat = [{'_', [], [{message, {current_stacktrace}}]}],
  305:     P = spawn(?MODULE, fixed_runner, [self(), Fun]),
  306:     erlang_trace(P, true, [call]),
  307:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test6, 1}, Pat, [local]),
  308:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test6, 0}, Pat, [local]),
  309:     collect(P, [{trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f2_test6, [f1]},
  310:                    [
  311:                     {?MODULE, f3_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 21}]},
  312:                     {?MODULE, f5_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 14}]},
  313:                     {?MODULE, fixed_runner, 2, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 7}]}
  314:                    ]},
  315:                 {trace, P, call, {?MODULE, f1_test6, []},
  316:                    [
  317:                     {?MODULE, f2_test6, 1, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 25}]},
  318:                     {?MODULE, f3_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 21}]},
  319:                     {?MODULE, f5_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 14}]},
  320:                     {?MODULE, fixed_runner, 2, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 7}]}
  321:                    ]}
  322:                ]),
  323: 
  324:     Pat2 = [{'_', [], [{message, {current_stacktrace, 3}}]}],
  325:     P2 = spawn(?MODULE, fixed_runner, [self(), Fun]),
  326:     erlang_trace(P2, true, [call]),
  327:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test6, 1}, Pat2, [local]),
  328:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test6, 0}, Pat2, [local]),
  329:     collect(P2, [{trace, P2, call, {?MODULE, f2_test6, [f1]},
  330:                    [
  331:                     {?MODULE, f3_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 21}]},
  332:                     {?MODULE, f5_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 14}]},
  333:                     {?MODULE, fixed_runner, 2, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 7}]}
  334:                    ]},
  335:                 {trace, P2, call, {?MODULE, f1_test6, []},
  336:                    [
  337:                     {?MODULE, f2_test6, 1, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 25}]},
  338:                     {?MODULE, f3_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 21}]},
  339:                     {?MODULE, f5_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 14}]}
  340:                    ]}
  341:                ]),
  342: 
  343:     %% Test when erts_backtrace_depth is less than depth
  344:     OldDepth = erlang:system_flag(backtrace_depth, 2),
  345:     try
  346:         P3 = spawn(?MODULE, fixed_runner, [self(), Fun]),
  347:         erlang_trace(P3, true, [call]),
  348:         erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2_test6, 1}, Pat2, [local]),
  349:         erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1_test6, 0}, Pat2, [local]),
  350:         collect(P3, [{trace, P3, call, {?MODULE, f2_test6, [f1]},
  351:                        [
  352:                         {?MODULE, f3_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 21}]},
  353:                         {?MODULE, f5_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 14}]}
  354:                        ]},
  355:                     {trace, P3, call, {?MODULE, f1_test6, []},
  356:                        [
  357:                         {?MODULE, f2_test6, 1, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 25}]},
  358:                         {?MODULE, f3_test6, 0, [{file, "test6.erl"}, {line, 21}]}
  359:                        ]}
  360:                    ])
  361:     after
  362:         erlang:system_flag(backtrace_depth, OldDepth)
  363:     end,
  364: 
  365:     ok.
  366: 
  367: %% Test that caller and return to work as they should
  368: %% There was a bug where caller would be undefined when return_to was set
  369: %% for r the bif erlang:put().
  370: caller_and_return_to(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  371:     tr(
  372:       fun do_put_wrapper/0,
  373:       fun (Tracee) ->
  374:               MsgCaller = [{'_',[],[{message,{caller}}]}],
  375:               1 = erlang_trace(Tracee, true, [call,return_to]),
  376:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,do_put,1}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  377:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,do_the_put,1}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  378:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  379:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {erlang,put,2}, MsgCaller, [local]),
  380: 
  381:               [{trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,do_put,[test]},{?MODULE,do_put_wrapper,0}},
  382:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,do_the_put,[test]},{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  383:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[1]},{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  384:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  385:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,put,[test,"1"]},{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  386:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_the_put,1}},
  387:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  388: 
  389:                %% These last trace messages are a bit strange...
  390:                %% if call tracing had been enabled for do_put_wrapper
  391:                %% then caller and return_to would have been {?MODULE,do_put_wrapper,1}
  392:                %% but since it is not, they are set to do_put instead, but we still
  393:                %% get the do_put_wrapper return_to message...
  394:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]},{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  395:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_put,1}},
  396:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,do_put_wrapper,0}}
  397:               ]
  398:       end),
  399:     ok.
  400: 
  401: do_put_wrapper() ->
  402:     do_put(test),
  403:     ok.
  404: 
  405: do_put(Var) ->
  406:     do_the_put(Var),
  407:     erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)).
  408: do_the_put(Var) ->
  409:     Lst = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  410:     erlang:put(Var, Lst).
  411: 
  412: otp_9422(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  413:     Laps = 10000,
  414:     Fun1 = fun() -> otp_9422_tracee() end,
  415:     P1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, loop_runner, [self(), Fun1, Laps]),
  416:     io:format("spawned ~p as tracee\n", [P1]),
  417: 
  418:     erlang_trace(P1, true, [call, silent]),
  419: 
  420:     Fun2 = fun() -> otp_9422_trace_changer() end,
  421:     P2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, loop_runner, [self(), Fun2, Laps]),
  422:     io:format("spawned ~p as trace_changer\n", [P2]),
  423: 
  424:     start_collect(P1),
  425:     start_collect(P2),
  426: 
  427:     %%receive after 10*1000 -> ok end,
  428: 
  429:     stop_collect(P1),
  430:     stop_collect(P2, abort),
  431:     ok.
  432:     
  433: otp_9422_tracee() ->
  434:     ?MODULE:f1(a),
  435:     ?MODULE:f1(b),
  436:     ?MODULE:f1(c).
  437: 
  438: otp_9422_trace_changer() ->
  439:     Pat1 = [{[a], [], [{enable_trace, arity}]}],
  440:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1, 1}, Pat1),
  441:     Pat2 = [{[b], [], [{disable_trace, arity}]}],
  442:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1, 1}, Pat2).
  443: 
  444:     
  445:     
  446: 
  447: 
  448: bad_match_spec_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  449:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:match_spec_run([1], <<>>)),
  450:     B0 = <<1,2>>,
  451:     {B,_} = split_binary(B0, 0),
  452:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch ets:match_spec_run([1], B)),
  453:     ok.
  454: 
  455: 
  456: 
  457: %% Test the erlang:system_info(trace_control_word) and
  458: %% erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, Value) BIFs,
  459: %% as well as the get_tcw/0 and set_tcw/1 PAM instructions
  460: trace_control_word(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  461:     32 = Bits = tcw_bits(),
  462:     High = 1 bsl (Bits - 1),
  463:     erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, 17),
  464:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
  465:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  466:        [{'_',[{'=:=', {get_tcw}, 17}],[]}],
  467:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [a]}}]),
  468:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
  469:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  470:        [{'_',[{'=:=', {get_tcw}, 18}],[]}],
  471:        []),
  472:     erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, High),
  473:     tr(fun() -> ?MODULE:f1(a) end,
  474:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  475:        [{'_',[{'=:=', {get_tcw}, High}],[]}],
  476:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [a]}}]),
  477:     erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, 0),
  478:     tr(fun() -> 
  479:                ?MODULE:f1(a), 
  480:                ?MODULE:f1(start), 
  481:                ?MODULE:f1(b), 
  482:                ?MODULE:f1(c), 
  483:                ?MODULE:f1(high), 
  484:                ?MODULE:f1(d),
  485:                ?MODULE:f1(stop), 
  486:                ?MODULE:f1(e) 
  487:        end,
  488:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  489:        [{[start],
  490:          [],
  491:          [{message, {set_tcw, 17}}]},
  492:         {[stop],
  493:          [],
  494:          [{message, {set_tcw, 0}}]},
  495:         {[high],
  496:          [],
  497:          [{message, {set_tcw, High}}]},
  498:         {['_'],
  499:          [{'>', {get_tcw}, 0}],
  500:          [{set_tcw, {'+', 1, {get_tcw}}}, {message, {get_tcw}}] }],
  501:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [start]}, 0},
  502:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [b]}, 18},
  503:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [c]}, 19},
  504:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [high]}, 19},
  505:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [d]}, High + 1},
  506:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [stop]}, High + 1}]),
  507:     0 = erlang:system_info(trace_control_word),
  508:     ok.
  509: 
  510: tcw_bits() ->
  511:     tcw_bits(erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, 0), 0, 0).
  512: 
  513: tcw_bits(Save, Prev, Bits) ->
  514:     Curr = 1 bsl Bits,
  515:     case catch erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, Curr) of
  516:         {'EXIT' , {badarg, _}} ->
  517:             Prev = erlang:system_flag(trace_control_word, Save),
  518:             Bits;
  519:         Prev ->
  520:             Curr = erlang:system_info(trace_control_word),
  521:             tcw_bits(Save, Curr, Bits+1)
  522:     end.
  523: 
  524: 
  525: %% Test the erlang:trace(_, _, [silent]) flag
  526: %% as well as the silent/0 PAM instruction
  527: silent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  528:     %% Global call trace
  529:     tr(fun() -> 
  530:                ?MODULE:f1(a),     % No trace - not active
  531:                ?MODULE:f1(miss),  % No trace - no activation
  532:                ?MODULE:f1(b),     % No trace - still not active
  533:                ?MODULE:f1(start), % Trace    - activation
  534:                ?MODULE:f1(c),     % Trace    - active
  535:                f1(d),             % No trace - local call
  536:                ?MODULE:f1(miss),  % Trace    - no inactivation
  537:                ?MODULE:f1(e),     % Trace    - still active
  538:                ?MODULE:f1(stop),  % No trace - inactivation
  539:                ?MODULE:f1(f)      % No trace - not active
  540:        end,
  541:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  542:        [call, silent],
  543:        [{[start],
  544:          [],
  545:          [{silent, false}, {message, start}]},
  546:         {[stop],
  547:          [],
  548:          [{silent, true}, {message, stop}]},
  549:         {[miss],
  550:          [],
  551:          [{silent, neither_true_nor_false}, {message, miss}]},
  552:         {['$1'],
  553:          [],
  554:          [{message, '$1'}] }],
  555:        [global],
  556:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [start]}, start},
  557:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [c]}, c},
  558:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [miss]}, miss},
  559:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [e]}, e} ]),
  560:     %% Local call trace
  561:     tr(fun() -> 
  562:                ?MODULE:f1(a),     % No trace - not active
  563:                f1(b),             % No trace - not active
  564:                ?MODULE:f1(start), % Trace    - activation
  565:                ?MODULE:f1(c),     % Trace    - active
  566:                f1(d),             % Trace    - active
  567:                f1(stop),          % No trace - inactivation
  568:                ?MODULE:f1(e),     % No trace - not active
  569:                f1(f)              % No trace - not active
  570:        end,
  571:        {?MODULE, f1, 1},
  572:        [call, silent],
  573:        [{[start],
  574:          [],
  575:          [{silent, false}, {message, start}]},
  576:         {[stop],
  577:          [],
  578:          [{silent, true}, {message, stop}]},
  579:         {['$1'],
  580:          [],
  581:          [{message, '$1'}] }],
  582:        [local],
  583:        [{call, {?MODULE, f1, [start]}, start},
  584:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [c]}, c},
  585:         {call, {?MODULE, f1, [d]}, d} ]),
  586:     ok.
  587: 
  588: %% Test the erlang:trace(_, _, [silent]) flag without match specs
  589: silent_no_ms(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  590:     %% Global call trace
  591:     %%
  592:     %% Trace f2/2 and erlang:integer_to_list/1 without match spec
  593:     %% and use match spec on f1/1 to control silent flag.
  594:     tr(
  595:       fun () -> 
  596:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  597:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  598:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  599:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  600:               ?MODULE:f1(start),
  601:               ?MODULE:f2(f, g),
  602:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  603:               ?MODULE:f3(h, i),
  604:               ?MODULE:f1(stop),
  605:               ?MODULE:f2(j, k),
  606:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  607:               ?MODULE:f3(l, m)
  608:       end,
  609:       fun (Tracee) ->
  610:               1 = erlang_trace(Tracee, true, [call,silent,return_to]),
  611:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [global]),
  612:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [global]),
  613:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern(
  614:                     {?MODULE,f1,1},
  615:                     [{[start],[],[{silent,false}]},
  616:                      {[stop],[],[{silent,true}]}],
  617:                     [global]),
  618:               %%
  619:               %% Expected: (no return_to for global call trace)
  620:               %%
  621:               [{trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[start]}},
  622:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[f,g]}},
  623:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  624:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[h,i]}}]
  625:       end),
  626:     %% Local call trace
  627:     %%
  628:     %% Trace f2/2 and erlang:integer_to_list/1 without match spec
  629:     %% and use match spec on f1/1 to control silent flag.
  630:     tr(
  631:       fun () -> 
  632:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  633:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  634:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  635:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  636:               ?MODULE:f1(start),
  637:               ?MODULE:f2(f, g),
  638:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  639:               ?MODULE:f3(h, i),
  640:               ?MODULE:f1(stop),
  641:               ?MODULE:f2(j, k),
  642:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  643:               ?MODULE:f3(l, m)
  644:       end,
  645:       fun (Tracee) ->
  646:               1 = erlang_trace(Tracee, true, [call,silent,return_to]),
  647:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [local]),
  648:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [local]),
  649:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern(
  650:                     {?MODULE,f1,1},
  651:                     [{[start],[],[{silent,false}]},
  652:                      {[stop],[],[{silent,true}]}],
  653:                     [local]),
  654:               %%
  655:               %% Expected:
  656:               %%
  657:               [{trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[start]}},
  658:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,
  659:                 {?MODULE,'-silent_no_ms/1-fun-3-',0}},
  660:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[f,g]}},
  661:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,
  662:                 {?MODULE,'-silent_no_ms/1-fun-3-',0}},
  663:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  664:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,
  665:                 {?MODULE,'-silent_no_ms/1-fun-3-',0}},
  666:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[h,i]}},
  667:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,f3,2}}]
  668:       end).
  669: 
  670: %% Test that match_spec_test does not activate silent
  671: silent_test(_Config) ->
  672:     {flags,[]} = erlang_trace_info(self(),flags),
  673:     erlang:match_spec_test([],[{'_',[],[{silent,true}]}],trace),
  674:     {flags,[]} = erlang_trace_info(self(),flags).

  677: %% Test the match spec functions {trace/2}
  678: ms_trace2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  679:     Tracer = self(),
  680:     %% Meta trace init
  681:     %%
  682:     %% Trace global f1/1, local f2/2, global erlang:integer_to_list/1
  683:     %% without match spec. Use match spec functions
  684:     %% {trace/2} to control trace through fn/2,3.
  685:     tr(
  686:       fun () -> 
  687:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  688:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  689:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  690:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  691:               fn([all], [call,return_to,{tracer,Tracer}]),
  692:               ?MODULE:f1(f),
  693:               f2(g, h),
  694:               f1(i),
  695:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  696:               ?MODULE:f3(j, k),
  697:               fn([call,return_to], []),
  698:               ?MODULE:f1(l),
  699:               ?MODULE:f2(m, n),
  700:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  701:               ?MODULE:f3(o, p)
  702:       end,
  703:       fun (Tracee) ->
  704:               1 = erlang_trace(Tracee, false, [all]),
  705:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f1,1}, [], [global]),
  706:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [local]),
  707:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [global]),
  708:               3 = erlang_trace_pattern(
  709:                     {?MODULE,fn,'_'},
  710:                     [{['$1','$2'],[],
  711:                       [{trace,'$1','$2'},{message,ms_trace2}]}],
  712:                     [meta]),
  713:               %%
  714:               %% Expected: (no return_to for global call trace)
  715:               %%
  716:               Origin = {match_spec_SUITE,'-ms_trace2/1-fun-1-',1},
  717:               [{trace_ts,Tracee,call,
  718:                 {?MODULE,fn,
  719:                  [[all],[call,return_to,{tracer,Tracer}]]},
  720:                 ms_trace2},
  721:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[f]}},
  722:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[g,h]}},
  723:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,Origin},
  724:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  725:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[j,k]}},
  726:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,f3,2}},
  727:                {trace_ts,Tracee,call,
  728:                 {?MODULE,fn,
  729:                  [[call,return_to],[]]},
  730:                 ms_trace2}]
  731:       end),
  732:     %% Silence valgrind
  733:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,fn,'_'},[],[]),
  734:     ok.
  735: 
  736: 
  737: 
  738: %% Test the match spec functions {trace/3}
  739: ms_trace3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  740:     TraceeName = 'match_spec_SUITE:ms_trace3',
  741:     Tracer = self(),
  742:     %% Meta trace init
  743:     %%
  744:     %% Trace global f1/1, local f2/2, global erlang:integer_to_list/1
  745:     %% without match spec. Use match spec functions
  746:     %% {trace/2} to control trace through fn/2,3.
  747:     Tag = make_ref(),
  748:     Controller =
  749:     spawn_link(
  750:       fun () ->
  751:               receive 
  752:                   {Tracee,Tag,start} ->
  753:                       fn(TraceeName, [all], 
  754:                          [call,return_to,send,'receive',
  755:                           {tracer,Tracer}]),
  756:                       Tracee ! {self(),Tag,started},
  757:                       receive {Tracee,Tag,stop_1} -> ok end,
  758:                       fn(Tracee, [call,return_to], []),
  759:                       Tracee ! {self(),Tag,stopped_1},
  760:                       receive {Tracee,Tag,stop_2} -> ok end,
  761:                       fn(Tracee, [all], []),
  762:                       Tracee ! {self(),Tag,stopped_2}
  763:               end
  764:       end),
  765:     tr(
  766:       fun () -> %% Action
  767:               register(TraceeName, self()),
  768:               ?MODULE:f1(a),
  769:               ?MODULE:f2(b, c),
  770:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(1)),
  771:               ?MODULE:f3(d, e),
  772:               Controller ! {self(),Tag,start},
  773:               receive {Controller,Tag,started} -> ok end,
  774:               ?MODULE:f1(f),
  775:               f2(g, h),
  776:               f1(i),
  777:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(2)),
  778:               ?MODULE:f3(j, k),
  779:               Controller ! {self(),Tag,stop_1},
  780:               receive {Controller,Tag,stopped_1} -> ok end,
  781:               ?MODULE:f1(l),
  782:               ?MODULE:f2(m, n),
  783:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(3)),
  784:               ?MODULE:f3(o, p),
  785:               Controller ! {self(),Tag,stop_2},
  786:               receive {Controller,Tag,stopped_2} -> ok end,
  787:               ?MODULE:f1(q),
  788:               ?MODULE:f2(r, s),
  789:               _ = erlang:integer_to_list(id(4)),
  790:               ?MODULE:f3(t, u)
  791:       end,
  792: 
  793:       fun (Tracee) -> %% Startup
  794:               1 = erlang_trace(Tracee, false, [all]),
  795:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f1,1}, [], [global]),
  796:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {?MODULE,f2,2}, [], [local]),
  797:               1 = erlang_trace_pattern( {erlang,integer_to_list,1}, [], [global]),
  798:               3 = erlang_trace_pattern(
  799:                     {?MODULE,fn,'_'},
  800:                     [{['$1','$2','$3'],[],
  801:                       [{trace,'$1','$2','$3'},{message,Tag}]}],
  802:                     [meta]),
  803:               %%
  804:               %% Expected: (no return_to for global call trace)
  805:               %%
  806:               Origin = {match_spec_SUITE,'-ms_trace3/1-fun-2-',2},
  807:               [{trace_ts,Controller,call,
  808:                 {?MODULE,fn,[TraceeName,[all],
  809:                              [call,return_to,send,'receive',
  810:                               {tracer,Tracer}]]},
  811:                 Tag},
  812:                {trace,Tracee,'receive',{Controller,Tag,started}},
  813:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f1,[f]}},
  814:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[g,h]}},
  815:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,Origin},
  816:                {trace,Tracee,call,{erlang,integer_to_list,[2]}},
  817:                {trace,Tracee,call,{?MODULE,f2,[j,k]}},
  818:                {trace,Tracee,return_to,{?MODULE,f3,2}},
  819:                {trace,Tracee,send,{Tracee,Tag,stop_1},Controller},
  820:                {trace_ts,Controller,call,
  821:                 {?MODULE,fn,[Tracee,[call,return_to],[]]},
  822:                 Tag},
  823:                {trace_ts,Controller,call,
  824:                 {?MODULE,fn,[Tracee,[all],[]]},
  825:                 Tag}]
  826:       end),
  827:     ok.
  828: 
  829: %% Test that a dead tracer is removed using ms
  830: ms_trace_dead(_Config) ->
  831:     Self = self(),
  832:     TFun = fun F() -> receive M -> Self ! M, F() end end,
  833:     {Tracer, MRef} = spawn_monitor(TFun),
  834:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(TFun),
  835:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f1, '_'},
  836:                          [{'_',[],[{message, false},
  837:                                    {trace,[],
  838:                                     [call,{const,{tracer,Tracer}}]}]}],
  839:                          [{meta, MetaTracer}]),
  840:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2, '_'}, []),
  841:     ?MODULE:f2(1,2),
  842:     ?MODULE:f1(1),
  843:     {tracer,Tracer} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  844:     {flags,[call]} = erlang_trace_info(self(), flags),
  845:     ?MODULE:f2(2,3),
  846:     receive {trace, Self, call, {?MODULE, f2, _}} -> ok end,
  847:     exit(Tracer, stop),
  848:     receive {'DOWN',MRef,_,_,_} -> ok end,
  849:     ?MODULE:f1(2),
  850:     {tracer,[]} = erlang_trace_info(self(), tracer),
  851:     ?MODULE:f2(3,4),
  852:     TRef = erlang:trace_delivered(all),
  853:     receive {trace_delivered, _, TRef} -> ok end,
  854:     receive M -> ct:fail({unexpected, M}) after 10 -> ok end.
  855: 
  856: %% Test that destructive operations in test bif does not really happen
  857: destructive_in_test_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  858:     {ok,OldToken,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  859: 				([],
  860: 				 [{'_',[],[{message,{get_seq_token}}]}],trace),
  861:     {ok,_,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  862: 			 ([],
  863: 			  [{'_',[],[{message,{set_seq_token, label, 1}}]}],
  864: 			  trace),
  865:     {ok,OldToken,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  866: 				([],
  867: 				 [{'_',[],[{message,{get_seq_token}}]}],trace),
  868:     {ok, OldTCW,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  869: 			       ([],[{'_',[],[{message,{get_tcw}}]}],trace),
  870:     {ok,OldTCW,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  871: 			      ([],
  872: 			       [{'_',[],[{message,{set_tcw, OldTCW+1}}]}],
  873: 			       trace),
  874:     {ok, OldTCW,_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test
  875: 			       ([],[{'_',[],[{message,{get_tcw}}]}],trace),
  876:     ok.
  877: 
  878: %% Test that the comparison between boxed and small does not crash emulator
  879: boxed_and_small(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  880:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  881:     ok = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,do_boxed_and_small,[]),
  882:     peer:stop(Peer).
  883: 
  884: do_boxed_and_small() ->
  885:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{1.47,'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  886:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{12345678901234567890,'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  887:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{<<1,2,3,4>>,'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  888:     {ok, false, _, _} = erlang:match_spec_test({0,3},[{{make_ref(),'_'},[],['$_']}],table),
  889:     ok.
  890: 
  891: %% Test that faulty seq_trace_call does not crash emulator
  892: faulty_seq_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  893:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  894:     ok = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,do_faulty_seq_trace,[]),
  895:     peer:stop(Peer).
  896: 
  897: do_faulty_seq_trace() ->
  898:     {ok,'EXIT',_,_} = erlang:match_spec_test([],[{'_',[],[{message,{set_seq_token,yxa,true}}]}],trace),
  899:     ok.
  900: 
  901: errchk(Pat) ->
  902:     case catch erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, f2, 2}, Pat) of
  903: 	{'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
  904: 	    ok;
  905: 	Other ->
  906: 	    ct:fail({noerror, Other})
  907:     end.
  908: 
  909: %% Checks that unary minus works
  910: unary_minus(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  911:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  912: 			      (5,
  913: 			       [{'$1',
  914: 				 [{'<',{'-','$1'},-4}],
  915: 				 [true]}],
  916: 			       table),
  917:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  918: 			      (5,
  919: 			       [{'$1',
  920: 				 [{'<',{'-','$1'},-6}],
  921: 				 [true]}],
  922: 			       table),
  923:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  924: 			      (5,
  925: 			       [{'$1',
  926: 				 [{'=:=',{'-','$1',2},3}],
  927: 				 [true]}],
  928: 			       table),
  929:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  930: 			      (hej,
  931: 			       [{'$1',
  932: 				 [{'=/=',{'-','$1'},0}],
  933: 				 [true]}],
  934: 			       table),
  935:     ok.
  936: 
  937: %% Checks that unary plus works
  938: unary_plus(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  939:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  940: 			      (5,
  941: 			       [{'$1',
  942: 				 [{'<',{'+','$1'},6}],
  943: 				 [true]}],
  944: 			       table),
  945:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  946: 			      (5,
  947: 			       [{'$1',
  948: 				 [{'<',{'+','$1'},4}],
  949: 				 [true]}],
  950: 			       table),
  951:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  952: 			      (5,
  953: 			       [{'$1',
  954: 				 [{'=:=',{'+','$1',2},7}],
  955: 				 [true]}],
  956: 			       table),
  957:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  958: 			      (hej,
  959: 			       [{'$1',
  960: 				 [{'=/=',{'+','$1'},0}],
  961: 				 [true]}],
  962: 			       table),
  963:     ok.
  964: 
  965: 
  966:     
  967: 
  968: %% Checks that exceptions in guards are handled correctly
  969: guard_exceptions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  970:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  971: 			       (5,
  972: 				[{'$1',
  973: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},{'or','$1','$1'}}],
  974: 				  [true]}],
  975: 				table),
  976:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  977: 			       (5,
  978: 				[{'$1',
  979: 				  [{'orelse',{is_integer,'$1'},
  980: 				    {'or','$1','$1'}}],
  981: 				  [true]}],
  982: 				table),
  983:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  984: 			       (5,
  985: 				[{'$1',
  986: 				  [{'orelse',{'or','$1',true},
  987: 				    {is_integer,'$1'}}],
  988: 				  [true]}],
  989: 				table),
  990:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  991: 			       (5,
  992: 				[{'$1',
  993: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
  994: 				    {'orelse','$1',true}}],
  995: 				  [true]}],
  996: 				table),
  997:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
  998: 			       (5,
  999: 				[{'$1',
 1000: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
 1001: 				    {'orelse',true,'$1'}}],
 1002: 				  [true]}],
 1003: 				table),
 1004:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
 1005: 			       (5,
 1006: 				[{'$1',
 1007: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
 1008: 				    {'andalso',false,'$1'}}],
 1009: 				  [true]}],
 1010: 				table),
 1011:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
 1012: 			       (5,
 1013: 				[{'$1',
 1014: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
 1015: 				    {'andalso','$1',false}}],
 1016: 				  [true]}],
 1017: 				table),
 1018: 
 1019:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test
 1020: 			       (5,
 1021: 				[{'$1',
 1022: 				  [{'or',{is_integer,'$1'},
 1023: 				    {'andalso','$1',false}}],
 1024: 				  [true]}],
 1025: 				table),
 1026: 
 1027:     ok.
 1028: 
 1029: %% Checks floating point exceptions in match-specs
 1030: fpe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1031:     MS = [{{'$1'},[],[{'/','$1',0}]}],
 1032:     case catch (['EXIT','EXIT'] = 
 1033: 		ets:match_spec_run([{1},{2}],ets:match_spec_compile(MS))) of 
 1034: 	{'EXIT',_} -> ct:fail({error, "Floating point exceptions faulty"});
 1035: 	_ -> ok 
 1036:     end.
 1037: 
 1038: %% Test maps in match-specs
 1039: maps(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1040:     {ok,#{},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{'_',[],['$_']}], table),
 1041:     {ok,#{},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{#{},[],['$_']}], table),
 1042:     {ok,false,[],[]} =
 1043:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{not_a_map,[],['$_']}], table),
 1044:     {ok,bar,[],[]} =
 1045:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{foo => bar},
 1046:                                [{#{foo => '$1'},[],['$1']}],
 1047:                                table),
 1048:     {ok,false,[],[]} =
 1049:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{foo => bar},
 1050:                                [{#{foo => qux},[],[qux]}],
 1051:                                table),
 1052:     {ok,false,[],[]} =
 1053:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{#{foo => '_'},[],[foo]}], table),
 1054:     {error,_} =
 1055:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{}, [{#{'$1' => '_'},[],[foo]}], table),
 1056:     {ok,bar,[],[]} =
 1057:         erlang:match_spec_test({#{foo => bar}},
 1058:                                [{{#{foo => '$1'}},[],['$1']}],
 1059:                                table),
 1060:     {ok,#{foo := 3},[],[]} =
 1061:         erlang:match_spec_test({}, [{{},[],[#{foo => {'+',1,2}}]}], table),
 1062: 
 1063:     {ok,"camembert",[],[]} =
 1064:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{b => "camembert",c => "cabécou"},
 1065:                                [{#{b => '$1',c => "cabécou"},[],['$1']}], table),
 1066: 
 1067:     {ok,#{a :="camembert",b := "hi"},[],[]} =
 1068:         erlang:match_spec_test(#{<<"b">> =>"camembert","c"=>"cabécou", "wat"=>"hi", b=><<"other">>},
 1069:                                [{#{<<"b">> => '$1',"wat" => '$2'},[],[#{a=>'$1',b=>'$2'}]}],
 1070:                                table),
 1071: 
 1072:     {ok,1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{map_size,'$1'}]}],table),
 1073:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[],[{map_size,'$1'}]}], table),
 1074:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[{map_size,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
 1075:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[{'=:=',{map_size,'$1'},1}],[true]}], table),
 1076: 
 1077:     {ok,1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{map_get,a,'$1'}]}], table),
 1078:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{map_get,b,'$1'}]}], table),
 1079:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[],[{map_get,b,'$1'}]}], table),
 1080:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[{map_get,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
 1081:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[{map_get,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
 1082:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => true}, [{'$1',[{map_get,a,'$1'}],[true]}], table),
 1083: 
 1084:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{is_map_key,a,'$1'}]}], table),
 1085:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[],[{is_map_key,b,'$1'}]}], table),
 1086:     {ok,'EXIT',[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[],[{is_map_key,a,'$1'}]}], table),
 1087:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => 1}, [{'$1',[{is_map_key,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
 1088:     {ok,false,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(not_a_map, [{'$1',[{is_map_key,b,'$1'}],['$_']}], table),
 1089:     {ok,true,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a => true}, [{'$1',[{is_map_key,a,'$1'}],[true]}], table),
 1090: 
 1091:     %% large maps
 1092: 
 1093:     Ls0 = [{I,<<I:32>>}||I <- lists:seq(1,415)],
 1094:     M0  = maps:from_list(Ls0),
 1095:     M1  = #{a=>1,b=>2,c=>3,d=>4},
 1096: 
 1097:     R1  = M0#{263 := #{ a=> 3 }},
 1098:     Ms1 = [{M1#{c:='$1'},[],[M0#{263 := #{a => '$1'}}]}],
 1099: 
 1100:     {ok,R1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M1,Ms1,table),
 1101: 
 1102:     Ms2 = [{M0#{63:='$1', 19:='$2'},[],[M0#{19:='$1', 63:='$2'}]}],
 1103:     R2  = M0#{63 := maps:get(19,M0), 19 := maps:get(63,M0) },
 1104:     {ok,R2,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0,Ms2,table),
 1105: 
 1106:     ok = maps_check_loop(M1),
 1107:     ok = maps_check_loop(M0),
 1108:     M2 = maps:from_list([{integer_to_list(K),V} || {K,V} <- Ls0]),
 1109:     ok = maps_check_loop(M2),
 1110: 
 1111:     %% Maps in guards
 1112:     {ok,#{a:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{a=>1}}],['$1']}], table),
 1113:     {ok,#{a:='$1'},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>'$1'}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}],['$1']}], table),
 1114:     {ok,#{a:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{{const,a}=>1}}],['$1']}], table),
 1115:     {ok,#{20:=1,b:=2},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test({11,#{20=>1,b=>2}},[{{'$1','$2'},[{'==','$2',#{{'+','$1',9}=>{'-','$1',10},b=>{const,2}}}],['$2']}], table),
 1116:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of small maps.
 1117:     true = lists:any(
 1118:              fun(N) ->
 1119:                      {ok,#{1=>1,2=>N},[],[]} ==
 1120:                          erlang:match_spec_test(#{1=>1,2=>N},[{'$1',[{'==','$1',#{1=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,1}=>4,{'+',2,0}=>5}}],['$1']}],table)
 1121:              end,[2,3,4,5]),
 1122:     %% Test what happens when a map is collapsed from hash to flatmap
 1123:     {ok,#{0:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{0=>1},[{'$1',[{'==','$1',maps:from_list([{{'-',I,I},1} || I <- lists:seq(1,100)])}],['$1']}], table),
 1124: 
 1125:     %% Large maps in guards
 1126:     {ok,#{a:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>1}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',M0#{a=>1}}],['$1']}], table),
 1127:     {ok,#{a:='$1'},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>'$1'}, [{'$1',[{'==','$1',M0#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}],['$1']}], table),
 1128:     {ok,#{520:=1,b:=2},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test({11,M0#{520=>1,b=>2}},[{{'$1','$2'},[{'==','$2',M0#{{'+','$1',509}=>{'-','$1',10},b=>{const,2}}}],['$2']}], table),
 1129:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of hash maps.
 1130:     true = lists:any(
 1131:              fun(N) ->
 1132:                      {ok,M0#{1:=1,2:=N},[],[]} == erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{1=>1,2=>N},[{'$1',[{'==','$1',M0#{1=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,1}=>4,{'+',2,0}=>5}}],['$1']}], table)
 1133:              end, [2,3,4,5]),
 1134: 
 1135:     %% Maps in body
 1136:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=2},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{a=>'$1',b=>{const,2}}]}], table),
 1137:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{a=>'$1',b=>#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1138:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{a=>'$1',{const,b}=>#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1139:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of small maps.
 1140:     true = lists:any(
 1141:              fun(N) ->
 1142:                      {ok,#{2=>N},[],[]} == erlang:match_spec_test(#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[#{{'+',3,-1}=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,'$1'}=>4,{'+',2,0}=>5}]}], table)
 1143:              end,[1,2,3,4,5]),
 1144:     %% Test what happens when a map is collapsed from hash to flatmap
 1145:     {ok,#{0:=1},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(#{0=>1},[{'$1',[],[maps:from_list([{{'-',I,I},1} || I <- lists:seq(1,100)])]}], table),
 1146: 
 1147:     %% Large maps in body
 1148:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[M0#{a=>'$1',b=>M0#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1149:     {ok,#{a:=1,b:=#{a:='$1'}},[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{a=>1},[{#{a=>'$1'},[],[M0#{a=>'$1',{const,b}=>M0#{a=>{const,'$1'}}}]}], table),
 1150:     %% Test that maps with duplicate keys work. This depends on the iteration order of hash maps.
 1151:     true = lists:any(
 1152:              fun(N) ->
 1153:                      {ok,M0#{1:=1,2:=N},[],[]} == erlang:match_spec_test(M0#{1=>1,2=>5},[{'$1',[],[M0#{1=>1,2=>2,{const,2}=>3,{'+',1,1}=>4,{'*',2,1}=>5}]}], table)
 1154:              end,[2,3,4,5]),
 1155: 
 1156:     ok.
 1157: 
 1158: maps_check_loop(M) ->
 1159:     Ks = maps:keys(M),
 1160:     maps_check_loop(M,M,M,M,Ks,lists:reverse(Ks),1).
 1161: 
 1162: maps_check_loop(Orig,M0,MsM0,Rm0,[K|Ks],[Rk|Rks],Ix) ->
 1163:     MsK  = list_to_atom([$$]++integer_to_list(Ix)),
 1164:     MsM1 = MsM0#{K := MsK},
 1165:     Rm1  = Rm0#{Rk := MsK},
 1166:     M1   = M0#{Rk  := maps:get(K,MsM0)},
 1167:     Ms   = [{MsM1,[],[Rm1]}],
 1168:     {ok,M1,[],[]} = erlang:match_spec_test(Orig,Ms,table),
 1169:     maps_check_loop(Orig,M1,MsM1,Rm1,Ks,Rks,Ix+1);
 1170: maps_check_loop(_,_,_,_,[],[],_) -> ok.
 1171: 
 1172: 
 1173: empty_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1174:     Val=[{'$1',[], [{message,'$1'},{message,{caller}},{return_trace}]}],
 1175:      %% Did crash debug VM in faulty assert:
 1176:     erlang:match_spec_test([],Val,trace).
 1177: 
 1178: moving_labels(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1179:     %% Force an andalso/orelse construction to be moved by placing it
 1180:     %% in a tuple followed by a constant term. Labels should still
 1181:     %% point at their correct target.
 1182:     %% 
 1183:     Ms = [{{'$1','$2'},[],[{{ok,{'andalso','$1','$2'},[1,2,3]}}]}],
 1184:     {ok,{ok,false,[1,2,3]},[],[]} =
 1185: 	erlang:match_spec_test({true,false}, Ms, table),
 1186: 
 1187:     Ms2 = [{{'$1','$2'},[],[{{ok,{'orelse','$1','$2'},[1,2,3]}}]}],
 1188:     {ok,{ok,true,[1,2,3]},[],[]} =
 1189: 	erlang:match_spec_test({true,false}, Ms2, table),
 1190: 
 1191:     ok.
 1192: 
 1193: -record(dummy_record, {}).
 1194: 
 1195: %% GH-7045: Some guard BIFs were unavailable in match specifications.
 1196: guard_bifs(_Config) ->
 1197:     Matches =
 1198:         [begin
 1199:              BIF = list_to_tuple([F | lists:duplicate(A, '$1')]),
 1200:              erlang:match_spec_test(Data, [{{'$1'}, [BIF], [{{'$1'}}]}], Kind)
 1201:          end
 1202:          || {F, A} <- erlang:module_info(functions),
 1203:             {Data, Kind} <- [{{a}, table}, {[a], trace}],
 1204:             F =/= is_record, %% Has special requirements, checked below.
 1205:             erl_internal:arith_op(F, A) orelse
 1206:                 erl_internal:bool_op(F, A) orelse
 1207:                 erl_internal:comp_op(F, A) orelse
 1208:                 erl_internal:guard_bif(F, A)],
 1209:     [] = [T || {error, _}=T <- Matches],
 1210: 
 1211:     IsRecord = {is_record,
 1212:                 '$1',
 1213:                 dummy_record,
 1214:                 record_info(size, dummy_record)},
 1215:     [{ok, _, [], []} =
 1216:          erlang:match_spec_test(Data, [{{'$1'}, [IsRecord], [{{'$1'}}]}], Kind)
 1217:      || {Data, Kind} <- [{{#dummy_record{}}, table},
 1218:                          {[#dummy_record{}], trace}]],
 1219: 
 1220:     ok.
 1221: 
 1222: tr(Fun, MFA, Pat, Expected) ->
 1223:     tr(Fun, MFA, [call], Pat, [global], Expected).
 1224: 
 1225: tr(Fun, MFA, TraceFlags, Pat, PatFlags, Expected0) ->
 1226:     tr(Fun,
 1227:        fun(P) ->
 1228:                erlang_trace(P, true, TraceFlags),
 1229:                erlang_trace_pattern(MFA, Pat, PatFlags),
 1230:                lists:map(
 1231:                  fun(X) when is_function(X,1) -> X;
 1232:                     (X) -> list_to_tuple([trace, P | tuple_to_list(X)])
 1233:                  end,
 1234:                  Expected0)
 1235:        end).
 1236: 
 1237: tr(RunFun, ControlFun) ->
 1238:     P = spawn_link(?MODULE, runner, [self(), RunFun]),
 1239:     collect(P, ControlFun(P)).
 1240: 
 1241: collect(P, TMs) ->
 1242:     start_collect(P),
 1243:     collect(TMs),
 1244:     stop_collect(P).
 1245: 
 1246: collect([]) ->
 1247:     receive
 1248: 	M ->
 1249:             erlang:display({?LINE,got_unexpected, M}),
 1250: 	    io:format("Got unexpected: ~p~n", [M]),
 1251: 	    flush({got_unexpected,M})
 1252:     after 17 ->
 1253: 	    ok
 1254:     end;
 1255: collect([TM | TMs]) ->
 1256:     io:format(        "Expecting:      ~p~n", [TM]),
 1257:     receive
 1258:         %% We only look at trace messages with the same tracee
 1259:         %% as the message we are looking for. This because
 1260:         %% the order of trace messages is only guaranteed from
 1261:         %% within a single process.
 1262: 	M0 when element(2, M0) =:= element(2, TM); is_function(TM, 1) ->
 1263: 	    M = case element(1, M0) of
 1264: 		    trace_ts ->
 1265:                         erlang:delete_element(tuple_size(M0), M0);
 1266: 		    _ -> M0
 1267: 		end,
 1268: 	    case is_function(TM,1) of
 1269: 		true ->
 1270: 		    case (catch TM(M)) of
 1271: 			true ->
 1272: 			    io:format("Got:            ~p~n", [M]),
 1273: 			    collect(TMs);
 1274: 			_ ->
 1275:                             erlang:display({?LINE,got_unexpected, M}),
 1276: 			    io:format("Got unexpected: ~p~n", [M]),
 1277: 			    flush({got_unexpected,M})
 1278: 		    end;
 1279: 
 1280: 		false ->
 1281: 		    case M of
 1282: 			TM ->
 1283: 			    io:format("Got:            ~p~n", [M]),
 1284: 			    collect(TMs);
 1285: 			_ ->
 1286:                             erlang:display({?LINE,got_unexpected, M}),
 1287: 			    io:format("Got unexpected: ~p~n", [M]),
 1288: 			    flush({got_unexpected,M})
 1289: 		    end
 1290: 	    end
 1291:     after 15000 ->
 1292:             flush(timeout)
 1293:     end.
 1294: 
 1295: flush(Reason) ->
 1296:     receive
 1297:         M ->
 1298:             io:format("In queue:       ~p~n", [M]),
 1299:             flush(Reason)
 1300:     after 17 ->
 1301:               ct:fail(Reason)
 1302:     end.
 1303: 
 1304: start_collect(P) ->
 1305:     P ! {go, self()}.
 1306: 
 1307: stop_collect(P) ->
 1308:     stop_collect(P, done).
 1309: stop_collect(P, Order) ->
 1310:     P ! {Order, self()},
 1311:     receive
 1312:         {gone, P} ->
 1313:             ok
 1314:     end.
 1315: 
 1316: 
 1317: runner(Collector, Fun) ->
 1318:     receive
 1319:         {go, Collector} ->
 1320:             go
 1321:     end,
 1322:     Fun(),
 1323:     receive
 1324:         {done, Collector} ->
 1325:             Collector ! {gone, self()}
 1326:     end.
 1327: 
 1328: loop_runner(Collector, Fun, Laps) ->
 1329:     receive
 1330:         {go, Collector} ->
 1331:             go
 1332:     end,
 1333:     loop_runner_cont(Collector, Fun, 0, Laps).
 1334: 
 1335: loop_runner_cont(Collector, _Fun, Laps, Laps) ->
 1336:     receive
 1337:         {done, Collector} -> ok;
 1338:         {abort, Collector} -> ok
 1339:     end,
 1340:     io:format("loop_runner ~p exit after ~p laps\n", [self(), Laps]),
 1341:     Collector ! {gone, self()};
 1342: 
 1343: loop_runner_cont(Collector, Fun, N, Laps) ->
 1344:     Fun(),
 1345:     receive
 1346:         {abort, Collector} ->
 1347:             io:format("loop_runner ~p aborted after ~p of ~p laps\n", [self(), N+1, Laps]),
 1348:             Collector ! {gone, self()}
 1349:     after 0 ->
 1350:               loop_runner_cont(Collector, Fun, N+1, Laps)
 1351:     end.
 1352: 
 1353: 
 1354: f1(X) ->
 1355:     {X}.
 1356: 
 1357: f2(X, Y) ->
 1358:     {X, Y}.
 1359: 
 1360: f3(X,Y) ->
 1361:     ?MODULE:f2(X,Y),
 1362:     ok.
 1363: 
 1364: fn(X) ->
 1365:     [X].
 1366: fn(X, Y) ->
 1367:     [X, Y].
 1368: fn(X, Y, Z) ->
 1369:     [X, Y, Z].
 1370: 
 1371: fbinmatch(<<Int, Rest/binary>>, Acc) ->
 1372:     fbinmatch(Rest, [?MODULE:f1(Int) | Acc]);
 1373: fbinmatch(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
 1374: 
 1375: id(X) ->
 1376:     X.
 1377: 
 1378: -file("test4.erl", 1).
 1379: f3_test4(X,Y) ->
 1380:     ?MODULE:f2_test4(X,Y), % Line 3 - This line number should remain stable
 1381:     ok.
 1382: 
 1383: f2_test4(X, _) ->
 1384:     ?MODULE:f1_test4(X).
 1385: 
 1386: f1_test4(X) ->
 1387:     {X}.
 1388: 
 1389: -file("test5.erl", 1).
 1390: f3_test5(X,Y) ->
 1391:     f2_test5(X,Y), % Line 3 - This line number should remain stable
 1392:     ok.
 1393: 
 1394: f2_test5(X, _) ->
 1395:     f1_test5(X).
 1396: 
 1397: f1_test5(X) ->
 1398:     {X}.
 1399: 
 1400: -file("test6.erl", 1).
 1401: fixed_runner(Collector, Fun) ->
 1402:     receive
 1403:         {go, Collector} ->
 1404:             go
 1405:     end,
 1406:     Fun(), % Line 7 - This line number should remain stable
 1407:     receive
 1408:         {done, Collector} ->
 1409:             Collector ! {gone, self()}
 1410:     end.
 1411: 
 1412: f5_test6() ->
 1413:     f3_test6(), % Line 14 - This line number should remain stable
 1414:     f4_test6().
 1415: 
 1416: f4_test6() ->
 1417:     f4.
 1418: 
 1419: f3_test6() ->
 1420:     f2_test6(f1), % Line 21 - This line number should remain stable
 1421:     f3.
 1422: 
 1423: f2_test6(X) ->
 1424:     X = f1_test6(), % Line 25 - This line number should remain stable
 1425:     f2.
 1426: 
 1427: f1_test6() ->
 1428:     f1.
